extends java.lang.Object
implements GameCallbackCollection, GameCallback

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void betAccepted​(Player player, Bet bet)
      Updates the view when a player successfully places a bet in the GameEngine
      void betCancelled​(Bet bet)
      Updates the view when a bet is successfully cancelled the GameEngine
      void betResult​(int spinNumber, Player player, Bet bet)
      Updates the view of the result of a finalised Bet in the GameEngine

      Updates view when a player is added to the GameEngine
      void playerRemoved​(Player player)
      Updates view when a player is removed from the GameEngine
      void pointsAdded​(Player player, int points)
      Updates a view when points are added to a player in the GameEngine (though not when bets are finalised)
      int registerCallback​(GameCallback callback)
      Registers a GameCallback; the callback is placed in a Collection.
      int removeCallback​(GameCallback callback)
      Removes supplied GameCallback from the Collection of registered callbacks.
      void spinHouseResult​(int spinNumber, int allPlayerTotalWin, int allPlayerTotalLoss)
      Updates the view of the house's total wins and losses at the conclusion of the in the GameEngine
      void spinPlayerTotal​(int spinNumber, Player player, java.util.Collection<Bet> bets, int playerTotalWin)
      Updates the view of the Player's totals and finalised Bets at the conclusion of the in the GameEngine
      void spinResult​(int spinNumber, Pocket pocket)
      Updates the view the winning (final / result) Pocket at the completion of a spin in the GameEngine
      void spinStart​(int spinNumber, Pocket pocket)
      Updates the view when a spin starts in the GameEngine
      void spinTick​(int spinNumber, int tick, Pocket pocket)
      Updates the view each intermediate tick the wheel during a spin in the GameEngine

                            int allPlayerTotalLoss)
        Description copied from interface: GameCallback

        Specified by:
        spinHouseResult in interface GameCallback

        allPlayerTotalWin - the total won by all players
